experience.title: Experience & Education
experience.subtitle: My professional and academic journey in data science
experience.professional.title: üíº Professional experience
experience.professional.airbus.title: Data Scientist Intern
experience.professional.airbus.project: Project: Data Science for Designing the Engine of Tomorrow
experience.professional.airbus.task1: Design and deployment of data engineering pipelines in Python to automate extraction, structuring and processing of unstructured technical reports (PDF, Word, Excel, OCR).
experience.professional.airbus.task2: Development and optimization of Large Language Models (LLM) via fine-tuning and prompt engineering (Llama 3) for classification and summarization of complex technical documents.
experience.professional.airbus.task3: Rigorous evaluation of models with ROUGE metrics and validation by domain experts to ensure reliability and compliance with aeronautical requirements.
experience.professional.airbus.task4: Strategic recommendations based on data analysis to prevent failures and optimize specifications of future propulsion systems (e.g., nacelle anti-ice system).
experience.professional.orange.title: Data Analyst (Intern)
In-depth statistical analysis of supplier response times for outsourced operations (UCI) using Python (Pandas, SciPy, Matplotlib, Seaborn, Statsmodels).
Identification of best and worst performing UCIs to optimize internal processes.
Assessment of the impact of variables (validator, department, UCI, month, entity type) on processing time validated by statistical tests (ANOVA, Kruskal-Wallis).
Development of a security KPI monitoring solution with Power BI and Looker Studio.
Creation of interactive visualizations and automated reports (PowerQuery, DAX) supporting national and operational unit decision-making.
experience.professional.univ.title: Computer Lab Monitor
experience.professional.univ.task1: Technical and pedagogical support to students on workstations and specialized software.
experience.professional.univ.task2: Management and maintenance of the computer lab: software installation, troubleshooting hardware and network issues.
experience.professional.univ.task3: Ensuring compliance with usage rules and equipment security.
experience.professional.univ.task4: Support during exams and practical computing sessions.
experience.professional.total.title: Cashier
experience.professional.total.task1: Customer reception and checkout at Total Berliet station.
experience.professional.total.task2: Sale of products and services, monitoring promotions.

projects.samples.defaultRisk.title: Credit Default Prediction
projects.samples.defaultRisk.subtitle: Classification ‚Ä¢ Machine Learning
projects.samples.defaultRisk.desc: Development of a classification model to predict banking credit default risk. Advanced feature engineering, class imbalance handling and hyperparameter optimization achieving 89% accuracy.
projects.samples.twitterSentiment.title: Twitter Sentiment Analysis
projects.samples.twitterSentiment.desc: Automatic sentiment classification on 100k French tweets. Advanced NLP preprocessing, word embeddings and LSTM model reaching 92% test accuracy.
projects.samples.salesDashboard.title: Interactive Sales Dashboard
projects.samples.salesDashboard.subtitle: Business Intelligence ‚Ä¢ Visualization
projects.samples.salesDashboard.desc: Real-time dashboard to analyze a SME's commercial performance. Dynamic KPIs, interactive filters and trend forecasting with automatic updates.
projects.samples.medicalImages.title: Medical Image Classification
projects.samples.medicalImages.subtitle: Computer Vision ‚Ä¢ CNN
projects.samples.medicalImages.desc: CNN model to classify chest X-rays and detect pneumonia. Transfer learning with ResNet50, data augmentation and validation on standardized medical dataset.
projects.samples.realEstate.title: Real Estate Price Prediction
projects.samples.realEstate.subtitle: Regression ‚Ä¢ Feature Engineering
projects.samples.realEstate.desc: Regression model estimating real estate prices in the Paris region. Geolocation, spatial feature engineering and ensemble models for R¬≤ = 0.87.
projects.samples.recommendation.title: Recommendation System
projects.samples.recommendation.subtitle: Recommendation ‚Ä¢ Collaborative Filtering
projects.samples.recommendation.desc: Movie recommendation system based on collaborative filtering and content analysis. Matrix factorization and cosine similarity for personalized suggestions.
